# Karat

A simple VM

## Dependencies ##
lua

## To Compile ##
`make generate ; make`

"make generate" only needs to be run once

### Preprocessor Flags ###
#### KDEBUG ####
Keep debug code in
#### KARAT\_PROD ####
Turn off some safety checks to improve speed

## Current features ##
* Simple set of opcodes, generated by custom lua script
* Working interpreter
* Leak-free error handling

## In Progress ##
- [ ] debugger
- [ ] modules
- [ ] embedding library
- [ ] macro system
- [ ] typed opcode arguments
- [ ] in-memory stack
- [x] opcode generation
- [x] command line arguments
